EXPLANATION.SOURCE_SUBJECTS_DIR: location; folder that has the raw MRIs of the subjects in archived or non-archived format
EXPLANATION.SOURCE_BIDS_DIR: location; path to the folder that, if NOT blank, pipeline will convert SOURCE_SUBJECTS_DIR to BIDS format
EXPLANATION.PROCESSED_FS_DIR: location; path to the folder that has the archived data processed with FreeSurfer
EXPLANATION.PROCESSED_FS_DIR_error: location; path to the folder that has the archived data processed with FreeSurfer but had error during processing
EXPLANATION.materials_DIR: location; path to folder with excel/csv files of subjects, variables, groups
EXPLANATION.GLM_file_group: name of the csv/xlsx file that is located in the materials_DIR folder and has the subjects and variables for processing and statistical analysis, see example in example/example_table.csv
EXPLANATION.id_col: name of the column in the csv/xlsx file that includes the names of the subjects similar to the names in PROCESSED_FS_DIR
EXPLANATION.group_col: name of the column in the csv/xlsx file that includes the groups
EXPLANATION.group_param: name of the column in the csv/xlsx file that is used to classify the groups from the group_col columns
EXPLANATION.regression_param: list of variables that will be used for the regression statistical analysis
EXPLANATION.variables_for_glm: list of variables that will be used for the FreeSurfe GLM analysis
EXPLANATION.other_params: list of variables that must be excluded from all statistical analysis
EXPLANATION.LOCATION: list locations that can be used for FreeSurfe, nilearn, dipy processing, glm and statistical analysis; must inlcude the variable 'local'
